error_no_group_selected: Something went wrong! No group selected
want_delete_group: Do you want to delete the group?
no_links_this_group: There are no links in this group
click_on_each_tab: Click on each tab to select or unselect it for saving to memory
enter_pass_unlock_content: Enter a password to unlock the content of this group
cant_remember_pass: Something went wrong! Cannot remember your password
open_tabs_delete_group: Open tabs and delete this group
new_name_saved: The new name has been saved
group_private_unlock_it: This group is private. You need to unlock it to see the options
group_created_without_tabs: Group created without any tabs selected
private_groups_are_secure: Private groups are secure and use encryption. Only users with the password can access them
enter_new_url_bind_private_to_new_url: Enter a new URL to bind your private group to this new URL. This group will be only visible in the list of groups only when you visit this specific URL. Do not forget to lock the group
enter_new_url_bind_to: Enter a new URL to bind to
url_must_start_with_http: URL must start with http:// or https://
input_one_emoji: The input must contain exactly one emoji
any_emoji_as_group_icon: Type any emoji to set it as a group icon
type_any_image_url_to_set_it: Type any image URL to set it as a group icon
group_name_or_tab_search: Group name or tab title to search...
lock_group_after_restore: Lock the group back after restoring the tabs
i_confirm_want_delete_groups: I confirm that I want to delete all groups
confirm_want_delete_groups: Confirm that you want to delete all groups
all_groups_deleted: All the groups have been deleted
show_private_groups_incognito: Show private groups only in browser incognito mode. In regular browser mode, they will be hidden
go_to_settings_and_enable_allow_incognit: Go to the extension settings and enable the option 'Allow in incognito' or 'Allow in Private'
override_existing_match: If the new group name matches an existing one, override it
only_private_groups_incognito: Show only private groups in browser incognito mode. It means that public groups will be hidden in incognito mode
export_all_your_groups: Export all of your tab groups. Keep in mind that private groups are not going to be exported. If you want to export them, you need to do it for each private group separately
import_private_public_groups: Import private or public tab groups
choose_file_import: Please choose a file to import
some_groups_already_exist_same_name: Some groups that you want to import already exist with the same name. Do you want to replace them?

many_attempts_locked_for.message: Too many attempts. Locked for $n$ minutes

many_attempts_next_attempt_in.message: Too many attempts. Next attempt in $n$ minutes

bind_group_url.message: Bind this group to the ($url$) URL. This will hide the group from everywhere else except this URL. It adds an extra layer of security

url_must_be_less_than.message: URL must be less than $n$ character

url_must_be_at_least.message: URL must be at least $n$ characters
